column5: Looking to hire a guide for the day ... anyone have any luck with anyone in particular?
I dunno if I'd pay someone to show me around GPool to be honest.   Look at the maps and figure a few things out.  It's not a hard lake to fish.

I dunno if I'd pay someone to show me around GPool to be honest.   Look at the maps and figure a few things out.  It's not a hard lake to fish.   Yup what he said. If I can do it on a toon, Im sure a guy with a motor boat can do it.  Bill, I was on the south west side during my 5 in 5. WOW, What great waters to fish.
You could try Erik Luzak of Bass Class: he's a good guy and a knowledgeable teacher...also has a couple good guys that he works with if double booked. www.bassclass.ca

Bill, I was on the south west side during my 5 in 5. WOW, What great waters to fish.  Yeah it's nice water, I've got a pretty good milk run of spots out there.  I've had a few big surprises out there as well (ie seeing giant muskie and walleye)

Yeah it's nice water, I've got a pretty good milk run of spots out there.  I've had a few big surprises out there as well (ie seeing giant muskie and walleye)   Yup. Talked to a local there. He says hit it in the fall. I,ll be back.
Shhhhh!  I have toon access. Good luck to a boater. I see the rocks and boulders, and just walk over them. LOL
